Package dev.nhuels.volunteerservice.controller

Class ShiftController

java.lang.Object
dev.nhuels.volunteerservice.controller.ShiftController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/shift") public class ShiftController extends Object
Controller for managing shifts. This controller provides methods for listing, creating, updating, registering, unregistering, and deleting shifts. It uses the @RestController, @CrossOrigin, and @RequestMapping annotations to define the controller and its mapping. It uses the @RequiredArgsConstructor annotation from Lombok to automatically generate a constructor with required arguments.

      @GetMapping("/list") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Set<ShiftDetailsDto>> listShifts()

      Returns:

    • register

      @PostMapping("/{shiftId}/register") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'VERIFIED\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> register(@PathVariable @NotNull @NotNull Long shiftId)

    • unregister

      @DeleteMapping("/{shiftId}/unregister") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> unregister(@PathVariable @NotNull @NotNull Long shiftId)
